CompanyAddress: 上海市黄浦区中华路1600号（近复兴东路）黄埔中心大厦15F
ComBrand: 道晟灯具（上海）有限公司
JobDescribe: 1.Feasibility Phase: The manufacturing process engineer provide the comments on new product idea from manufacturing capacity&capability point of view 在新产品开发可行性阶段，从生产制程能力角度提供制造建议和意见2.Design Phase: The manufacturing process engineer works with the marketing (Packaging/printing) and R&D teams to formulate a manufacturing process for the new product and estimate the manufacturing cost,    在新产品设计阶段会同市场部（产品包装和印字）和研发部定义产品加工工艺流程以及估算加工成本3.EPP Phase: They need to identify the jig/fixture/equipment needed for the new product and create the internal plan to follow them after Engineer Prototype stage 识别出新产品制造所需的工装治具以及设备需求，并制定内部计划来跟踪实施4.Create the SOP for the new product before PP and update of existing SOP when needed 编写新产品制造SOP以及维护已量产产品5.Organize the PP(Trial Run) and setup production line in collaboration with project leader/ workshop supervisor 组织新产品的小批量试生产，同时在项目组长和车间主任的配合下，完成生产线的布置6.Train the operators and line leaders how to assemble the new product when PP(Trial Run)  stage 负责员工操作培训7.Work out the PP report after PP done and share with the project leader 试产后，制作试生产报告8.Oversee process design projects and make sure the projects are completed on time 全面监控所负责的项目，确保相应的工程文件按时完成9.Besides designing new processes, they have to improve the present manufacturing or production processes to boost productivity, quality, and profitability for a company  除了新产品导入外，还需要持续改善量产产品工艺制程以提升生产效率，合格率以及盈利能力10.Research and purchase new manufacturing technology to better production equipment functionality 考量和引进新的加工工艺及设备11.Co-work with QE to identify the root cause of the issue happened on production line and find the corrective action 和QE一起分析找出产线不良的根本原因，并找到合适的解决方案12.Be responsible for the equipment management including equipment selection, register, regular maintenanceand repair and scrape 负责生产设备管理包括设备选型、到货后的验收登记、例行维护保养、故障维修联系以及设备报废 Requirement要求：1.College degree or above, major in Mechanical Engineering. 机械工程类专业，大专以上学历2. 5+ years process engineer experience. Lighting industry or electronic-mechanical background would be a plus. 5年以上工作经验，照明行业或机械电子类背景尤佳3.Skilled on fixtures design using AutoCAD，Pro-E or Solide Works 熟练使用绘图软件如CAD,Pro-e或Solide Works来进行工装治具设计4.Be familiar with industrialization knowledge and skilled on how to perform new product industrialization 熟悉相关的产品工业化的知识，能够应用相关的知识进行新产品的导入5.Good English both in reading and written. 良好的英语读写能力6.Excellent communication skills, sense of responsibility, initiative, team Spirit 良好的沟通能力，责任感，主动以及团队精神7.Able to work at a fast pace and under pressure 能够在任务压力下工作
ComName: 道晟灯具（上海）有限公司
